itunes:title: Episode 580 - Bert Kuntz Returns Baby!
title: Episode 580 - Bert Kuntz Returns Baby!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Bert Kuntz from TV to discuss what it's like to raise bison on his land in Wyoming, why now is the time to support your local rancher/farmer, how the Coronavirus restrictions put into place are an imm...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Bert Kuntz from TV to discuss what it's like to raise bison on his land in Wyoming, why now is the time to support your local rancher/farmer, how the Coronavirus restrictions put into place are an immense overreaction, the importance of working for yourself, and how the current political climate could brew up trouble.
